summary:
Hartley Charlton, macrumors. com:

Microsoft has confirmed to _Windows Central_ that it has ended production of the Surface Studio 2+, a premium all-in-one desktop designed for creative professionals.  With remaining stock now limited to retailers and partners, there is likely no successor to the Studio 2+ planned...
title: Microsoft hinges away from the Surface Studio
